files.name: README.md
files.content:
# syaOS â€” A Web-Based Agentic AI OS, made with Cursor

A modern web-based desktop environment inspired by classic macOS and Windows, built with React, TypeScript, and AI. Features multiple built-in applications, a familiar desktop interface, and a system-aware AI assistant. Works on all devicesâ€”desktop, tablet, and mobile.

## Features

### Desktop Environment
- Authentic macOS and Windows-style desktop interactions
- Multi-instance window manager with drag, resize, and minimize
- Customizable wallpapers (photos, patterns, or videos)
- System-wide sound effects and AI assistant (Ryo)
- Virtual file system with local storage persistence and backup/restore

### Themes
- **System 7** â€” Classic Mac OS look with top menubar and traffic-light controls
- **Aqua** â€” Mac OS X style with modern aesthetics
- **Windows XP** â€” Bottom taskbar, Start menu, and classic window controls
- **Windows 98** â€” Retro Windows experience with mobile-safe controls

### Built-in Applications
- **Finder** â€” File manager with Quick Access, storage info, and smart file detection
- **TextEdit** â€” Rich text editor with markdown, slash commands, and multi-window support
- **MacPaint** â€” Bitmap graphics editor with drawing tools, patterns, and import/export
- **Videos** â€” VCR-style YouTube player with playlist management
- **Soundboard** â€” Record and play custom sounds with waveform visualization
- **Synth** â€” Virtual synthesizer with multiple waveforms, effects, and MIDI support
- **Photo Booth** â€” Camera app with real-time filters and photo gallery
- **Internet Explorer** â€” Time Machine that explores web history via Wayback Machine; AI generates sites for years before 1996 or in the future
- **Chats** â€” AI chat with Ryo, public/private chat rooms, voice messages, and tool calling
- **Control Panels** â€” System preferences: appearance, sounds, backup/restore, and file system management
- **Minesweeper** â€” Classic puzzle game
- **Virtual PC** â€” DOS emulator for classic games (Doom, SimCity, etc.)
- **Terminal** â€” Unix-like CLI with AI integration (`ryo <prompt>`)
- **iPod** â€” 1st-gen iPod music player with YouTube import, lyrics, and translation
- **Applet Store** â€” Browse, install, and share community-created HTML applets

## Quick Start
1. Launch apps from the Finder, Desktop, or Apple/Start menu
2. Drag windows to move, drag edges to resize
3. Use Control Panels to customize appearance and sounds
4. Chat with Ryo AI for help or to control apps
5. Files auto-save to browser storage

Visit https://github.com/ryokun6/ryos for more information.

files.name: Quick Tips.md
files.content:
# Quick Tips

## Getting Started
- Launch apps from Finder, Desktop, or Apple/Start menu
- Multiple apps can run simultaneously with multi-window support
- Drag windows to move, drag edges to resize, minimize to dock
- Use Control Panels to customize appearance, sounds, and AI settings
- Drag apps from Finder to Desktop to create shortcuts

## Finder
- Browse Documents, Applications, Images, Applets, and Trash
- Sort by name, kind, size, or date modified
- Icon and list view options with Quick Access sidebar
- View storage info and file sizes
- Move files to Trash and empty when needed

## TextEdit
- Rich text editing with markdown support
- Format: bold, italic, underline, lists, headings
- Slash commands (/) for quick formatting and AI assistance
- Multi-window support for multiple documents
- Auto-saves your work to Documents folder

## MacPaint
- Drawing tools: pencil, brush, spray, eraser, fill
- Shape tools: rectangle, oval, line, polygon
- Pattern fills and custom colors
- Selection, move, copy, paste, and undo/redo
- Import images and export your creations

## Soundboard
- Record sounds from microphone with waveform preview
- Play with clicks or number keys (1-9)
- Customize with emojis and titles
- Import/export soundboards as JSON

## Synth
- Play with on-screen keyboard or computer keys (A-L row)
- Waveforms: sine, square, sawtooth, triangle, noise
- Effects: reverb, delay, distortion, filter
- MIDI keyboard support
- Save and load custom presets

## Photo Booth
- Take photos with webcam
- Real-time filters: sepia, noir, thermal, x-ray, etc.
- Multi-photo burst mode (4 photos)
- Photos saved to gallery strip

## Control Panels
- Change wallpapers (photos, patterns, videos, or custom uploads)
- Toggle UI sounds, typing synth, and terminal sounds
- Configure AI model and voice settings
- Backup and restore all settings and files
- Format or reset file system

## Internet Explorer
- Time travel through web history with Wayback Machine
- AI generates sites for years before 1996 or in the future
- View archived snapshots by clicking the clock icon
- Save favorites organized by year

## Chats with Ryo
- Chat with Ryo AI assistant for help or to control apps
- Ryo can create applets, edit documents, search the store
- Join public chat rooms (mention @ryo for AI responses)
- Push-to-talk voice messages (hold Space)
- Send ðŸ‘‹ nudge for context-aware tips
- Ryo becomes a DJ when music is playing in iPod

## Videos
- VCR-style YouTube player with retro aesthetics
- Playlist management with shuffle and repeat
- LCD display with scrolling titles
- Share videos with shareable links

## Virtual PC
- DOS emulator for classic games
- Play Doom, SimCity, Prince of Persia, and more
- Save and load game states
- Toggle CRT scanline effects

## Terminal
- Unix-like commands: ls, cd, cat, mkdir, touch, rm, vim
- Arrow keys for command history navigation
- Tab completion for files and commands
- `ryo <prompt>` to chat with AI directly
- `open <app>` to launch apps by name

## iPod
- Import YouTube URLs to build your music library
- Classic click-wheel navigation and controls
- Shuffle, repeat, and cover flow modes
- Time-synced lyrics with translation to any language
- Gesture controls for fine-tuning lyric timing
- Fullscreen lyrics view with background video
- Share tracks with shareable links

## Applet Store
- Browse and install community-created HTML applets
- One-click install and automatic updates
- Create and share your own applets
- Applets run in sandboxed environment
